item.title: Theme tutorial
item.description: title: “ES6版选项卡” date: 2022-03-02T23:34:24+08:00 ES6版选项卡 ES6 AJAX function ajax(url){ return new Promise((succ,error)=>{ var ajax= new XMLHttpRequest(); ajax.open('get',url,true); ajax.send; ajax.onload=function(){ succ(ajsx.responseText); }; ajax.onerror=function(){ error(); }; }).then((text)=>{ cosole.log(text); }).catch(()=>{ console.log(1); }) }
